Key Match Events: The result of the contest saw Edwards and the Timberwolves get the best of the matchup with a 108-106 win over the Clippers.
Edwards finished tonight's contest with 37 points, eight assists, seven rebounds, and attempted 29 shots.
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden commented on Anthony Edwards' performance, stating, 'He's aggressive, he gets his teammates open. Obviously he scores the ball at the highest level. He gets his teammates shots and that's what he's gonna have to do.'
